channel.title: Need help with a NPC Reset command ::npcreset. [[PI][317]]

item.title: Need help with a NPC Reset command ::npcreset. [[PI][317]]
item.dc:creator: @kid2kewl2bereal kid2kewl2bereal
item.description:
@kid2kewl2bereal wrote:

Okay, so, this is what I have in my source(was there already, I don’t believe it actually resets NPC’s):

[code=java] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“reloadspawns”)) {
Server.npcHandler = null;
Server.npcHandler = new server.model.npcs.NPCHandler();
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[" + c.playerName + "] " + “NPC Spawns have been reloaded.”);
}
}

		}[/code]

It sends a message to the player that used the command saying the NPC Spawns have been reloaded, but they don’t really reload, I don’t think?

Any help, please:\ Or could someone upload there PI npcreset/reloadspawns command?
Not sure, I’ve been looking at it, trying to figure it out, but I’m bad

Read full topic
